short_summary: HVAC unit replacement for Phase 2 utilization
description: This is the Phase 2 solicitation following an Invitation to Qualify. Only qualified suppliers have been invited to bid.
full_summary:
================

### Phase 2 EZ899-240220 HVAC Unit Replacement Tender Announcement

#### Solicitation Information

* **Reference Number:** WS4074115778 - Doc4127211615
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4074115778
* **Publication Date:** August 2, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** August 25, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST

#### Service Requirements

* **Service Category:** Air Conditioning Installation, Maintenance, or Repair Services (UNSBePRDC: 72101511)
* **Service Description:** The successful bidder will provide air conditioning installation, maintenance, or repair services for the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) in British Columbia.

#### Tendering Process

* **Tender Status:** Expired
* **Notice Type:** Invitation to Qualify
* **Procurement Category:** Construction (CNST)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

#### Contract Details

* **Expected Contract Start Date:** N/A
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2025
* **Regions of Delivery:** British Columbia, Canada
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Contracting Entity

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:**
	+ 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada, K1A 0S5
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Kelly Bryan (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Phone: N/A
	+ Email: [kelly.bryan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kelly.bryan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Important Dates

* **Publication Date:** August 2, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** August 25, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST

This tender announcement is for a Phase 2 solicitation following an Invitation to Qualify. Only qualified suppliers have been invited to bid. The successful bidder will provide air conditioning installation, maintenance, or repair services for the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) in British Columbia.
